name: ShootingStar (RYanIndieDev)
description:
This demo is made for my Unity tutorial. Please feel free to download and enjoy it. 

The tutorials for making this demo you can find them on my YouTube  or Bilibili channel. 

If you find any bug, please leave a comment below,  or find me via other media:  

Twitter: https://twitter.com/XuZuyan

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Yan.YouTube

Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/xuzuyan

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSRCf2y6LV8vpKSoXDoU2VQ

Bilibili: https://space.bilibili.com/27164588/

--------------------------------------------------------------------

这个Demo是为了我的Unity教程而做的，请自由下载试玩。

你可以在我的YouTube频道或Bilibili空间中找到制作这个Demo的教程。

如果发现了任何bug，烦请留言，或通过以下其他方式找到我，感谢你：
